invitation.email.about: {SITENAME} is an open peer-to-peer education platform where users collectively organize Courses. You can propose, discuss, develop and publish ideas and eventually meet nice people online or in real life. Enjoy sharing your experiences!
invitation.email.intro: You have been invited by {INVITER} to join "{TENANT}" on {SITENAME}.
invitation.email.unexpected: If you don't know why you got this email, ignore it or send us a notification to:
invitation.join.text: Become part of the organisation {TENANT} and propose, discuss, develop, organise and publish courses with {INVITER} and other amazing people in the organisation {TENANT}.
